messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

On Mon, Jan 30, 2012 at 21:44, Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> They weren't in that weekly snapshot, were they?

the gofix might have been; the packages hadn't been deleted yet.

On 31 January 2012 13:49, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> On Mon, Jan 30, 2012 at 21:44, Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org> wrote:
>> They weren't in that weekly snapshot, were they?
>
> the gofix might have been; the packages hadn't been deleted yet.

Nope, nige just added them:

https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=af2510fee42212fb1b7d72c736ba0342918eb814

Andrew

LGTM

fix typo in CL description.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=67f727f62e0e ***
